title: nidamE nAn un
sahitya:
nidamE nAn un padamE paNivEn nIyE en tuNai AvAi murugA


anupallavi

  padamE paNivEn parama guruvE parivODenakku aruL purivAi enavE


caraNam    cenni malai mEvum panniru kaiyanE kunrakkuDi tannil ninriDum ayyanE
kunrellAm kOyil koNDiDu meyyanE en manadil nI irundAl uivEnE
